name: Domination of Chaos
description:
This is an old unmaintained project, maybe I will update / maybe not, depends of my motivation. Thanks anyway players :D

Domination Of Chaos is a 1-bit clicker game made for the 1BIT Clicker jam.

In this game you play a necromancer who want to have a big tower. To complete this aim he have with him goblins, orqs, orgres and dragons.

This game plays entirely with the mouse.

HELP:
- The goal of the game is to buy the entire tower
- To win golds you must click on the minions at the bottom left
- Warning ! If you click too often it will run out and die
- You can also wait and they will earn money on their own
- With this money you can go to the shops
- You can buy other minions, buildings or objects
- To use the altar, click on it, this will sacrifice your least powerful minion and increase the life of others

Version 0.1:
- Buildings / Minions / Objects available
- All the tower is available
- Menu
- Shop

Todo:
- Ingame help
- More gameplay mechanics

Version 0.2:

  • Added whiteknights, they appear between each 3 or 7 minutes, you can pay them a tax or fight them
  • You now have power, whith big power you can kill whiteknights easier
  • If you pay tax you loose 15% of your golds
  • If you fight them and win you win 15% of your golds
  • If you fight them and loose you loose 30% of your gols and a random minion
  • Added forge, it cost 200golds, and you unlock weapons in the shop
  • Added sword, spear and hammer
  • Added a menu for altar, you can now choose who will die
  • Correct bugs

Version 0.2.1:

  • Importants bugs have been corrected, sorry for inconvenience
